metadata.title: CVE-2024-42154 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:tcp_metrics: validate source addr lengthI don't see anything checking that TCP_METRICS_ATTR_SADDR_IPV4is at least 4 bytes long, and the policy doesn't have an entryfor this attribute at all (neither does it for IPv6 but v6 ismanually validated).
